mapper.select: select book_proposal_no as bookProposalNo, user_no as userNo, book_writer as bookWriter, book_publisher as bookPublisher, book_name as bookName, book_kind as bookKind, book_introduce as bookIntroduce, isbn13 as ISBN13, book_count as bookCount, imageurl as imageurl, rCount as rCount from (select rownum as pNum, p.* from (select * from book_proposal order by 1 desc)p) where pNum between ${start} and ${end}
